channel.title: Startup app for interested stem individuals
channel.description: Mind Spark International is a student-based and upcoming social media platform dedicated to connecting students worldwide through STEM. Mind Spark aims to break free from the naturally strict process of publishing articles, papers, editorials, and more found in traditional scientific journals and magazines. Mind Spark aims to provide a free-flowing platform of shared thoughts and experiences relating to STEM. Our ultimate mission is to promote ingenuity and creative thinking in STEM through student narratives. If you are interested in our startup or want to submit your own works, please visit our website on our profile.
